___Inclination.description: X or Y axis rotation angle in radians.

___Azimuth.description: Z axis rotation angle in radians.

___Translation.description: Vector of translation in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

___MultipleOf.description: The step size of the range.

description:
Properties and capabilities of an High Intensity Focused Ultrasound transducer.
Schema on github: https://github.com/Engineer2B/PowerCalculator-Schemas
title: Properties of the HIFU transducer

___MultipleOf.description: The step size of the range.

___Powers.description: The supported range of the power in [W].

___ImmersionSurfaceId.description: The id of the surface in which the transducer is immersed.

___MultipleOf.description: The step size of the range.

___Frequencies.description: The supported range of the frequency in [Hz].

___NaturalFocus.description: Unshifted focus of the transducer in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

___ElementCoordinates.description: The coordinates of the transducer elements in [m].

___Inclination.description: X or Y axis rotation angle in radians.

___Azimuth.description: Z axis rotation angle in radians.

___Translation.description: Vector of translation in [m, m, m] (if ScaleFactor is 1).

___Transformation.description: Transformation applied to the transducer positions and natural focus.

___Direction.description: Normalized direction towards which the transducer is focused.
